name: Air Hockey 3D - Super AirHockey Game
description:
Super 3D Air Hockey is a addictive game for everyone of all ages!
You can play with friends or alone with a tricky computer
This App is UNIVERSAL so you can play on iPhone or iPad !
This Application has different variety of pucks, paddles and attractive boards. You can choose any one among them .
This App is compatible for iPhone 5 also.
.

Enjoy playing the Super 3D Air hockey game !!!
